data.Name: Primitive Man
data.Bio: Primitive Man is a blackened sludge metal/doom metal band formed in February 2012 and features Ben Kennedy on Drums, Ethan Lee McCarthy on Vocals and Guitar(Clinging to the Trees of a Forest Fire, Death of Self) and Jonathan Campos on Bass (Reproacher) Their debut full length "Scorn" is slated for an early 2013 release. Read more on Last.fm
